Text: Power Demand Forecast Weather Derivatives OnlineClimaton Research Co Subjects Weather Electricity Demand Forecast Online Weather Derivatives Online Data Pricing Tools To Vincent Kaminski ENRON Corporation As a professional concerned with power and weathers effects on power demand you must be interested in the two online services provided on Weather Electricity Demand Forecast Online When prompted please use user name guest password power valid until Weatherbased daily electricity demand forecast for each of the next days is issued every morning for the entire US geographical regions individual states and over the service area of most US power companies This information can assist power producers in scheduling their power plant operation help users to plan for potential interruption Power traders can use this info to predict shortterm power price movement So visit now and see how power demand is responding to the cold front currently attacking most part of the country Weather Derivatives Online Data Pricing Tools You can view and obtain historical HDD and CDD data and statistics for the past years for nearly weather stations in the United States You can also easily price an HDD or CDD call or put option for these stations using easytouse online pricing tools So visit now and see how you like it Thank you Climaton Research Co
